name: Name
app-error: An error has occurred in the application. The situation is fixed in our reports and will be considered as a matter of urgency. We apologize for the inconvenience, try to refresh the page or try again after a while

errors.unknown-email: Your mail is unfamiliar to us
errors.unprocessable-query: For reasons unknown to us, we are not currently able to process your request. The situation is fixed in our reports and will be considered as a matter of urgency. We apologize for the inconvenience, try to refresh the page or try again after a while
errors.forbidden: You do not have access to this page or to perform this operation

validation-messages.size: {attribute} cannot be {condition} {count} symbols | {attribute} cannot be {condition} {count} characters
validation-messages.unique: Such {attribute} is already taken | This {attribute} is already taken
validation-messages.confirmed: Confirm your {attribute}, values do not match | Confirm your {attribute}, values do not match
validation-messages.password-regex: Please enter a complex password. Use uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and at least one special character from #$^+=!*()@%&. We try to protect your data as much as possible and your password is an important part of the security of your information
validation-messages.name-regex: Name must contain letters, and also available numbers, dots, underscore and space
validation-messages.remember: In order for us to remember you, you just need to check this box
